casebody.data:
State
v.
Joseph M. Romano 199P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 24, 2016

Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Romano, Joseph M.

Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Todd Williams, District Attorney, For State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of May 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of May 2016."
